member.name: M:NETDLab6.frmMain.mnuFileNew_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Creates a new text editor form and opens it.

member.name: M:NETDLab6.frmMain.mnuFileOpen_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Allows a user to select a text file to open. The contents of the text file is opened in a new text editor.

member.name: M:NETDLab6.frmMain.mnuStripFileSave_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Saves the file by calling SaveFile() method in frmTextEditor.

member.name: M:NETDLab6.frmMain.mnuStripFileSaveAs_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Always saves the file in a chosen location with a chosen name by calling SaveFileAs() method in frmTextEditor.

member.name: M:NETDLab6.frmMain.mnuStripFileClose_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Closes currently active (focused) MDI child. If no MDI child is open, prompt to close application.

member.name: M:NETDLab6.frmMain.mnuStripFileExit_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: If there are no MDI children open, just closes the main form. If there are, ConfirmClose()'s all MDI children that are text editors.

member.name: M:NETDLab6.frmMain.mnuEditCut_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Cuts text by calling CutText() method in frmTextEditor.

member.summary: Copies text by calling CopyText() method in frmTextEditor.

member.name: M:NETDLab6.frmMain.mnuEditPaste_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Pastes text by calling PasteText() method in frmTextEditor.

member.summary: Change to vertical view.

member.summary: Change to horizontal view.

member.summary: Stores the text of the textbox into the variable newFile, whenever text is changed.

member.name: M:NETDLab6.frmTextEditor.SaveFileAs
member.summary: Allows user to create a new file in selected location, or overwrite an existing file. Calls SaveTextFile() method, giving it a file path.

member.summary: Saves the text file using a known file path.

member.summary: Stores user selected text into clipboard.

member.name: M:NETDLab6.frmTextEditor.CutText
member.summary: Stores user selected text into clipboard and removes it from the textbox.

member.name: M:NETDLab6.frmTextEditor.PasteText
member.summary: Sets copied text into user selected area.

member.summary: Asks user if they want to save the current file that was changed.
